title: Otiluke's Freezing Sphere
content:
Otiluke's Freezing Sphere Level 6 Evocation Spell 10~60 Damage 10d6 Cold Create a ball of churning ice that can be launched instantly to generate a frosty explosion or stored for later use. Melee CON Sav Action Level 6 Spell Slot

Otiluke's Freezing Sphere

Level 6 Evocation Spell

Create a ball of churning ice that can be launched instantly to generate a frosty explosion or stored for later use.

Otiluke's Freezing Sphere is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Otiluke's Freezing Sphere is a Lvl 6 Spell
